Unbabel/TowerInstruct-v0.1.Клинические наблюдения и личный опыт люд: Clinical observations and personal experiences of people with Asperger's syndrome suggest that there are three types of noise that they find very unpleasant. The first category is unexpected, sudden sounds (dogs barking, a phone ringing, a fire alarm). The second category is prolonged high-pitched sounds (a vacuum cleaner, the sound of flushing a toilet). The third category is confusing, complex and numerous sounds (sounds in large stores or at numerous social gatherings).

Unbabel/TowerInstruct-v0.1.Тактильная чувствительность может привес: Tactile sensitivity can also lead to dislike of certain school activities. A child with Asperger's syndrome may refuse to draw with their fingers or mold clay. There may be an overreaction to being tickled, a reaction to touching certain parts of the body, such as the lower back. When teenagers learn about this, they may be tempted to tease and torment a teenager with Asperger's syndrome by poking them in the back and enjoying their frightened reaction and obvious discomfort.
